what_you_do: Charlie Diamond is a leading 'Business Leadership Coach' & 'Business Marketing Consultant', 'Monetization Expert', 'Digital Nomad' and 'Global Citizen', travelling the world over to help Digital Entrepreneurs & Small Business Owners to 'Scale & Monetize their Offline Business Online'.
social_proof: Many Local Business Owners have seen their Financial Results 10X Fast since 2014, after consulting Charlie Diamond and his Global Network of 1,400+ Internet Experts, thanks to his '100% DONE-FOR-YOU' and 'no-nonsense' approach of 'Mobile Entrepreneurship and Modern Leadership for Every Man & Woman in the New Gig Economy of the 21st Century'.
signature_programs: 'The Ultimate Book On Business Freedom – From Average To Ever Rich In 91 Days… Guaranteed!' (out of print), and 'The 1 Billion Dollar Challenge' to create 1,000 Dollar Millionaires in the United States in 1,000 Days
business_focus: Helping digital entrepreneurs and small business owners scale and monetize their offline businesses online.
service_provided: business coaching, digital marketing consulting, monetization strategies
